altTitles.ja: ゆるゆり

description.en: Four mischievous girls illegally occupy the former Traditional Tea Ceremony clubroom, in order to create the "Amusement Club." These scamps…who ignore repeated warnings—in direct rebellion with the righteous directives of the Student Council—decide to remain in the room until they finally get off their bums and do something! In this slightly sluggish manga, full of fits and starts, the four girls set off from their homes for a walk together with days full of a little this and that!
description.pt-br: Quatro meninas sapecas ocupa ilegalmente o antigo salão de festas tradicional da cerimônia do chá, a fim de criar o "Club de diversões." Estes patifes ... que ignoram as advertências repetidas - em rebelião direta com as ordem de justiça do Conselho de Estudantes - decidem permanecer na sala até que finalmente saia seus vagabundos para fazerem alguma coisa! Neste manga ligeiramente lento, cheio de trancos e barrancos, as quatro meninas partiram de suas casas para um passeio em conjunto com dias cheios de um pouco disso e daquilo!

title.en: Shin Megami Tensei Apocrypha: War of the Dove

altTitles.ja-ro: Shin Megami Tensei Gaiten - Hato no Senki

altTitles.ja: 真・女神転生外典 鳩の戦記

description.en: A standalone story set in the larger Megami Tensei universe. Our hero Hato is just an ordinary schoolboy, until one day he receives a ~~Command Spell~~ Stigma on his left hand, forges a contract with ~~Lancer~~ Cu Chulainn to become his master, and is unwittingly dragged into a city-wide Holy ~~Grail~~ War.

altTitles.ja: ナヴィガトリア

description.en: Enter a world where the First Space War has ended, and Earth has claimed its first extraterrestrial colony. Manabu Houo, a boy born into a totalitarian state, finds his only joy in watching forbidden movies with his childhood friend, Hina-chan. However, one day upon returning home, he finds a group of government officials waiting for him...?! Watch as this thrilling sci-fi school drama unfolds on a distant planet!

altTitles.ja: テラフォーマーズ

description.en:
With the space program attempting to travel to Mars, 21st century scientists were tasked with warming up the planet so that humans could survive on its surface. They came up with an efficient and cost effective plan of sending cockroaches and mold to the surface so that the mold would absorb the sunlight and the insect corpses would serve as a food source for the mold.  
It is now the year 2599, and the first manned ship to Mars has landed on the planet and the six crew members are ready for their mission. But what they find on Mars, is something beyond their darkest imagination and fear…

title.en: Tensei Shitara Joban de Shinu Nakabosudatta ―Hiroin Kenzoku-ka de Ikinokoru―

altTitles.ja: 転生したら序盤で死ぬ中ボスだった ―ヒロイン眷属化で生き残る―

altTitles.en: When I Reincarnated, I was a Mid-boss Who Died Early in the Game ―Survive by Becoming a Household Member with Heroine―

altTitles.ja-ro: Tensei Shitara Joban de Shinu Naka Boss datta – Heroine Kenzokuka de Ikinokoru

description.en:
When I woke up after an accident, I was reincarnated as a mid-boss destined to die in the early stages of the game! In order to avoid being killed by the hero who should come attacking soon, I will fight and make the women my subordinates to increase my allies! 

An exhilarating fantasy of survival in another world!

Novel description for more info (MTL):
Toyo Akutsu unfortunately died in an accident, but the next moment he was somehow reincarnated in the world of a famous RPG as Ashnord, the weakest of the Four Heavenly Kings. At this rate, he will lose to the hero and die. Even if they are miraculously defeated, the heroes can raise their level and return. In order to survive, he has no choice but to use the forbidden bug technique ``Betrayal Bug'' to make the hero's group his followers and control their bodies and minds. Will Akutsu (Ash) be able to subjugate all the heroines, build a harem, and survive the death event...?
description.ja:
事故に遭って目が覚めたら、ゲームの序盤で死ぬ中ボスに転生!
やがて襲ってくるはずの勇者に殺されないために、××して女たちを眷属にして仲間を増やせ!
興奮必至の異世界サバイバルファンタジー!

---

- ![Syosetsu](<https://i.imgur.com/HI4jAzg.png>) [Web Novel (R18)](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n3298hj)

title.en: Tsugi wa Anata ga Yarareru Ban Death.

altTitles.ja: 次はアナタがヤられる番です。

altTitles.ja-ro: Tsugi wa Anata ga Yarareru Ban desu.

altTitles.es-la: Ahora es tu turno de ser derrotado.

altTitles.en: Next, it's Your Turn to be Killed

description.en:
The normal high school life came to an abrupt end when an armed group invaded. The students are toyed with by men who control the high school with firearms in their hands. An orgy of sex and death unfolds there. What awaits beyond that... Erotic suspense horror begins.

---
**Links:**
- [Alternative Official Raw on Nico Nico Seiga](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/64650)
description.ja:
当たり前の高校生活は武装した集団が侵入してきたことによって唐突に終わりを告げた。銃器を手にし高校を支配した男たちに生徒たちは弄ばれる。そこに展開される性と死の狂宴。その先に待つものは――。エロティックサスペンスホラー、開幕。

---
**Links:**
- [Alternative Official Raw on Nico Nico Seiga](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/64650)
description.es-la: Una vida normal en la secundaria pero llegó a un abrupto final cuando un grupo armado invadió. Los hombres armados que gobiernan la escuela secundaria juegan con los estudiantes. Allí se desarrolla una fiesta de sexo y muerte.

title.en: Minasama ni wa Jinken ga Gozaimasen

altTitles.ja: 皆様には人権がございません

altTitles.vi: Các ngươi không có quyền con người

description.en: XX years have passed since the enforcement of "The Human Rights Proper Use Act." In the city, "humans with rights" live prosperously, while "humans designated as livestock without rights" are displayed in shop windows. The humans used as pets, experimental animals, and meat are pitiful creatures living in a world separate from mine... or so it was supposed to be.

altTitles.ja: 鵺の陰陽師

description.en: Yajima has been able to see spirits since he was small. At his new school is a room that nobody else can see. And inside is a spirit who loves playing video games. A new modern exorcist saga now begins!
description.fr: Yajima est capable de voir les esprits depuis qu'il est tout petit. Dans sa nouvelle école, il y a une pièce que personne d'autre ne peut voir. Et à l'intérieur se trouve un esprit qui aime jouer aux jeux vidéo. Une nouvelle saga d'exorcistes modernes commence !
description.vi: Yajima đã có thể nhìn thấy các linh hồn từ khi còn nhỏ. Tại ngôi trường mới của cậu ấy có một căn phòng mà không ai khác có thể nhìn thấy. Và bên trong là một linh hồn thích chơi trò chơi điện tử. Một câu chuyện trừ tà hiện đại bắt đầu từ giây phút này!

title.en: Isekai de Pension Hajimemashita. Sekai de Yuiitsu no Kuro Majo desu ga, Kono Chikara wa Okyaku-sama no Tame ni Tsukaimasu

altTitles.ja-ro: Isekai de Pension Hajimemashita. Sekai de Yuiitsu no Kuro Majo desu ga, Kono Chikara wa Okyaku-sama no Tame ni Tsukaimasu

altTitles.ja: 異世界でペンション始めました。 世界で唯一の黒魔女ですが、この力はお客様のために使います

altTitles.ko: 이세계에서 펜션을 시작했습니다. 세계 유일의 흑마녀입니다만, 이 힘은 고객님을 위해 쓰겠습니다.

description.en: I lost my life in a fire at my workplace and found myself reborn in another world. My name in this life is Lunan. Moreover, according to my black cat master, I am a "black witch" and have the power to change the fate of the world. But I have a dream that I want to fulfill more than that. Yes, I want to run a "pension" where any guest can rest in peace. A fantasy of hospitality in a different world, depicting interactions with fluffy guests!

title.en: Satsuriku no Kuindeddo – 7-nin no Onna Shikeishuu

altTitles.ja: Satsuriku no Queen Dead – Nananin no Onna Shikeishuu
殺戮のクインデッド -7人の女死刑囚-

description.en: Deep Palace is a prison island that houses only death row inmates. A young girl, Akari, was kept in the "Deep Palace" for a certain purpose... One day, the death row inmates suddenly start killing each other! A battle royale called the “Killing” is taking place where prisoners can do whatever they want as they remain the last ones standing! In the face of this pandemonium, will Akari be able to safely survive the "Killing" and escape from the prison?!

altTitles.ja: 出遅れテイマーのその日暮らし

altTitles.en: The Life and Times of a Late Bloomer Tamer

altTitles.ja-ro: Deokure Tamer no Sono Higurashi
Deokure Teima no Sonohigurashi

description.en: The Law of Justice Online, also known as LJO, is the hottest new VRMMORPG of the season, and office worker Yuta Sasaki is one of the lucky few granted access to the official launch. After some careful research, Yuta is chomping at the bit to start his virtual life as a Tamer, a class that harnesses the powers of wild monsters. Luckily, upon building his character, Yuta manages to land not only his chosen class, but a heap of bonuses to boot! He soon finds, however, that his abilities are not all they're cracked up to be, and that the talents of the rare first monster he is granted lie not in combat...but gardening! Already well behind the other adventurers, and facing a long and slow progression path ahead of him, Yuta is left with two choices—start over from scratch, or make the best of what he has been given. For Yuta the choice is obvious: When life gives you manure...start up a farm!

altTitles.en: Lovetrap Island - Passion in Distant Lands -

altTitles.ja-ro: Rengoku Jima: Kyokuchi Renai

altTitles.ja: 恋獄島 ～極地恋愛～

altTitles.ja-ro: Rengokushima ~ kyokuchi renai ~
Rengokujima ~ kyokuchi renai ~

description.en:
Five travelers, 3 women and 2 men, wash ashore a remote island, survivors of ship sinking.

Finding themselves in this extreme situation, their instinct and conscience intersect and collide!
Crossing thoughts, feelings of love and hate mixed with trust and betrayal. A story of uncontrollable libido and murderous intent…

Original R18 web novel [here](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n1896br/)

title.en: Isekai de Tochi o Katte Noujou o Tsukurou

altTitles.ja-ro: Isekai de Tochi wo Katte Noujou wo Tsukurou

altTitles.en: Let's Buy the Land And Cultivate in Different World

altTitles.ja: 異世界で土地を買って農場を作ろう

altTitles.en: Let’s Buy the Land and Cultivate It in a Different World

description.en: As our humble corporatist Itonami Norio is suddenly summoned to another world, it would look as if he'll be sent to a battlefield– he, however, holds no skill to speak of, and as he is deemed to be useless. He negotiates with The King and receives a plot of land – an empty, deserted plot of land, with no inhabitant in sight. Norio holds something he couldn't bring himself to tell anyone: The Master of Supremacy, a gift which will grant him the most comfortable of lives in this world. Hereby begins the Norio's colorful story – having a mermaid he fishes declare herself his wife, becoming neighbors with the Undead King, this is his busy but enjoyable life – and now a dragon appears ?!

altTitles.ja: 異世界チートサバイバル飯

description.en: Kazusa Yuu, a Japanese high school student interested in food and camping, dies in a traffic accident and ends up reincarnated in the wilderness in another world. He must learn to survive in an unfamiliar environment, learn the powers he was granted and the magic of the world that is based on eating other creatures, and rescue fair maidens in distress to feed them and build up his harem.
description.pt: Kazusa Yuu, é um estudante japonês do ensino médio interessado em comida e camping, ele morre em um acidente de trânsito e acaba reencarnando no deserto em outro mundo. Ele deve aprender a sobreviver em um ambiente desconhecido, aprender os poderes que ele recebeu e a magia do mundo que se baseia em comer outras criaturas e resgatar donzelas em perigo para alimentá-las e construir seu harém.
description.pt-br: Kazusa Yuu, um estudante japonês do ensino médio interessado em culinária e campismo, morre num acidente de trânsito e acaba reencarnado na selva de outro mundo. Ele deve aprender a sobreviver num ambiente desconhecido, aprender sobre os poderes que ganhou e a magia do mundo que se baseia em comer outras creaturas e resgatar donzelas em perigo para as alimentar e construir o seu harém

altTitles.ja: メタリアルストーリー

description.en: Metalia, a world where mechanical creatures called the gears stroll. It was the so-called "machine hunters (collectors)" who hunted those who ruled the earth with mighty power. A boy now descends in Melzam, the largest city in Metaria. His name is Nill. He, with the right arm of the machine, had a secret. This is a story that looks for your fate.

title.en: Kimi to Sekai ga Owaru Hi ni

altTitles.en: Love You as the World Ends

altTitles.ja: 君と世界が終わる日に

description.en: On the day of his proposal, Hibiki Mamiya, a young man, is trapped in a tunnel collapse accident. When he narrowly escapes from the tunnel, the world has completely changed. A dilapidated cityscape, countless bodies, and the "living dead" wandering around the city... Amidst this abnormal situation, Hibiki desperately searches for his lover, but he is nowhere to be found. Will the few survivors survive together in this hopeless situation? The manga is based on the television drama, "Love You as the World Ends".

title.en: Seitokai ni mo Ana wa Aru!

altTitles.ja: 生徒会にも穴はある!

altTitles.en: There is Also a Hole in the Student Organization!
Even the Student Council has Holes

description.en: When it comes to the face of this student organization, it's a little weird, like a fool, scary, or moody. However, mysterious and futuristic days that seem strangely cute pass by.
description.ja: この生徒会の面子ときたら、あほの子だったり、恐ろしかったり、むっつりだったり、ちょっと変！ でも、それがなんだか、妙に可愛く思える今日この頃……。

title.en: Drug Store Tenin Sacchan no Nichijou

altTitles.ja-ro: Drugstore tenin sa-chan no nichijo
Doraggusutoa ten'in satchan no nichijō

altTitles.ja: ドラッグストア店員さっちゃんの日常

altTitles.vi: Chuyện nàng Sa ở tiệm thuốc

altTitles.en: Daily Life of Sa-chan, a Drugstore Clerk

altTitles.fr: Le quotidien de Sa-Chan, une vendeuse comme une autre

description.en: A series between the expressionless drugstore clerk, Sa-chan, and her boisterous childhood friend who's head over heels over Sa-chan but hesitant in confessing his love for her. Join them in their romcom-packed everyday life working at a drugstore.
description.id: Seri antara petugas toko obat tanpa ekspresi, Sa-chan, dan teman masa kecilnya yang riuh yang jungkir balik terhadap Sa-chan tetapi ragu-ragu dalam mengakui cintanya padanya. Bergabunglah dengan mereka dalam kehidupan sehari-hari mereka yang penuh romansa bekerja di toko obat.
description.ja: ドラッグストアで働くさっちゃんとその幼なじみが両思いなんだけど、お互い気づかなくて毎日やきもきする話です。
description.pt-br: Uma série entre a inexpressiva balconista da drogaria, Sa-chan, e seu turbulento amigo de infância que está de ponta-cabeça por Sa-chan, mas hesita em confessar seu amor por ela. Junte-se a eles em sua vida cotidiana repleta de comédia romântica trabalhando em uma farmácia.

title.en: Rise of the Kowtowing Girl ~Sacrificial Revenge Game~

altTitles.ja: 土下座少女の下剋上 ～生贄リベンジゲーム～

altTitles.en: The Ascendance of the Dogeza Girl ~Sacrifice Revenge Game~

description.en: In a mysterious school, there is a class where students with the lowest grades are sent, named the "isolated class". Akari, an ordinary female student, falls into the "isolated class" due to her friend's betrayal, where she is exposed to irrational senseless violence! However, she stands up to the members who dominate the class with an unyielding heart. At the same time, Akari joins forces with Yuto, another student who has fallen into the segregated class, and vows to climb out of this mess...

title.en: Senpai ga Uzai Kouhai no Hanashi

altTitles.en: A Story About a Senior Who Annoys His Junior
A Story About a Senpai Who Annoys His Kouhai

altTitles.ja-ro: Senpai ga Urusai Kouhai no Hanashi

altTitles.ja: 先輩がうざい後輩の話

description.en:
Futaba Igarashi is a diminutive office lady who finds that her towering and boisterous work senpai Harumi Takeda always gets in her hair, but he always has her back, he always keeps her company, and she starts noticing that her heart is slowly veering towards him…  
  
1st place of Tsugi Manga Awards, Category Webmanga (2018)

---

description.ja:
ちょっぴりガサツだけど面倒見のいい先輩・武田と、そんな彼に素直になれない（？）後輩・五十嵐。

今日も五十嵐は武田をうざいと思いつつ、本当はまんざらでもなかったりやっぱり本当にうざいときもあったりと自覚のない二人の微妙な距離感にもだえちゃうことまちがいなし！
description.uk: Іґараші - працьовита молода офісна жінка. Такеда - семпай з роботи, нервує її постійно - і все ж вона стає все ближче до нього. Кожен день наповнений комічними невдачами та романтичними моментами, коли Іґараші намагається збалансувати роботу, життя та кохання.
description.pt-br: Igarashi é uma jovem esforçada que trabalha em um escritório. Takeda, o senpai acima dela no trabalho, a irrita constantemente - e ainda assim ela se encontra cada vez mais próxima dele. Todos os dias são repletos de contratempos cômicos e momentos românticos enquanto Igarashi tenta equilibrar trabalho, vida e amor.

altTitles.ja: 生きてるうちに推してくれ

description.en:
A new frontier drawn by Mr. Niwa of Tokusatsu Gagaga! Fans are only spirits!  ?  Idol on the edge of the cliff, exorcist started-
 Since childhood, Misaki Kira has been a loner because of her ability to "see" strange things. When she came to Tokyo to change her life, she was scouted and debuted as an idol! Start your glittering idol life!  When you think about it, the only ones who can help you are spirits... Life as an idol doesn't go well, and on the day before he gets fired, he meets a priest with mysterious powers!? An exorcist unit comedy by a precipice idol and a fishy boy!

title.en: Blade Skill Online: Gomi Shokugyou de Saijaku Bukide Kuso Status no Ore, Itsunomanika "Last Boss" ni Nariagarimasu!

altTitles.ja: ブレイドスキル・オンライン
ブレイドスキル・オンライン～ゴミ職業で最弱武器でクソステータスの俺、いつのまにか『ラスボス』に成り上がります！～

description.en:
The weakest piece of shit is the final boss!?
Overwhelmingly unlucky high school student Yuri. What he obtained was the VRMMO 『Blade Skill Online』, which could be used to change the luck value. "Summoner", which is considered to be the strongest occupation on the capture site, and "Bow", the strongest weapon. Furthermore, play the game world with extreme "luck value"! ――It should have been, but I was forced to grab false information!
The summoner is a garbage job, the bow is the weakest weapon, and the luck value is a fucking status!? Moreover, as a result of random character creation, the avatar is a beautiful girl!? Before I knew it, I was treated as
the last boss for some reason— !?

title.en: Musuko ga Kawaikute Shikataganai Mazoku no Hahaoya

altTitles.en: Demon Mother: My Son is so Cute, I Just Can't Help Myself!

altTitles.es-la: La madre demonio indefensa frente a la lindura de su hijo

altTitles.zh: 儿子可爱过头的魔族母亲

altTitles.ja: 息子がかわいくて仕方がない魔族の母親

altTitles.ko: 아들이 귀여워서 어쩔 수 없는 마족엄마

altTitles.tr: Oğlunun Tatlılığına Karşı Koyamayan Bir Şeytan Anne

description.en:
Lorem, an infamous and fearsome demoness, has had to settle down for the sake of Gospel, her baby boy. Try as she might, she is a loving and doting mother, but she remains fearsome to both fellow demon and human onlookers because she retains the dire reputation of her wild and terrible youth years past.

For the sake of motherly love, she has to persevere, to learn and to thrive in a world where she's not alone. For the sake of Gospel and his future.

Feel the Love in it!
description.tr: Bir iblisin kötü günlerini arkada bırakarak, anne olma yolundaki adımlarını anlatan sevimli bir seri.

altTitles.ja: 入学傭兵

altTitles.th: พี่ชายสายบอดี้การ์ด

description.de:
Im Alter von acht Jahren verlor Ijin Yoo seine Eltern bei einem Flugzeugabsturz und strandete in einem fremden Land, wo er gezwungen war, ein Kindersöldner zu werden, um zu überleben. Zehn Jahre später kehrt er nach Hause zurück, um mit seiner Familie in Korea wieder vereint zu sein. Dort scheint alles friedlich zu sein, doch schon bald muss Ijin feststellen, dass das Leben als Teenager eine ganz andere Art des Überlebens ist. Da ihm nur noch ein Jahr in der Oberschule bleibt, muss Ijin neue Taktiken erlernen, um sich auf dem Schlachtfeld der Schule zurechtzufinden. Kann er ein Jahr Oberschule überleben? Oder wird die Schule vielmehr in der Lage sein, IHN zu überleben?

---
Die Geschichte handelt von einem jungen Koreaner, der bei einem Flugzeugabsturz seine Eltern verloren hat. Das Kind landet irgendwie in einem vom Krieg zerrissenen Teil der Welt und wird zu einem Top-Söldner im Teenageralter. Irgendwie findet er seine Familie wieder und beschließen, ein ruhiges Leben mit seiner Familie zu führen.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=5611024), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=758150)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://www.webtoons.com/en/action/teenage-mercenary/list?title_no=2677)
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/shaonianyongbing/list?title_no=1575)
* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/action/mercenary-soldier/list?title_no=2416)
* [French / Français](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/action/high-school-mercenary/list?title_no=2678)
* [German / Deutsch](https://www.webtoons.com/de/action/teenage-mercenary/list?title_no=3732)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://www.webtoons.com/id/action/high-school-soldier/list?title_no=2367)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001139)
* [Spanish / Español](https://www.webtoons.com/es/action/teenage-mercenary/list?title_no=3252)
* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://www.webtoons.com/th/action/high-school-soldier/list?title_no=2438)
description.en:
At the age of eight, Ijin Yu lost his parents in a plane crash and became stranded in a foreign land, forced to become a child mercenary in order to stay alive. He returns home ten years later to be reunited with his family in Korea, where food and shelter are plenty and everything seems peaceful. But Ijin will soon learn that life as a teenager is a whole other feat of survival. With only one year of high school left, Ijin must master new tactics to maneuver his way around the schoolhouse battleground.

Can he survive a year of high school? Or rather, will the school be able to survive him?
description.es:
A los ocho años, Ijin Yu perdió a sus padres en un accidente aéreo y quedó varado en un país extranjero, forzado a convertirse en mercenario para sobrevivir. Diez años después, regresa a su hogar para reunirse con su familia en Corea, en donde sobra la comida y todo parece estar en paz. Sin embargo, Ijin pronto descubrirá que la vida de adolescente es otro tipo de supervivencia. En su último año de secundaria, Ijin debe dominar nuevas tácticas para resistir en el campo de batalla escolar. ¿Podrá sobrevivir a su último año? ¿O podrá su escuela sobrevivir a él?

---

description.fr:
Ijin est un jeune mercenaire qui est le seul survivant d’un accident d’avion survenu dans son enfance. Il vient tout juste de retourner auprès de sa famille qui le croyait mort durant ses 10 ans d’absence. Ijin pourra-t-il mettre de côté son passé sombre et mener une vie normale de lycéen?

---

Yu Ijin volt az egyetlen túlélője egy repülőgép-szerencsétlenségnek, amikor még kicsi volt. Miután zsoldosnak állt, hogy 10 évig túléljen, visszatér a családjához a szülővárosába.

description.id:
Yoo Leejin, satu-satunya orang yang hidup dari kecelakaan pesawat terbang, harus bekerja sebagai tentara bayaran selama 10 tahun. Tapi akhirnya dia kembali ke tempat asalnya dan memulai kehidupan baru sabagai anak SMA biasa. Apakah dia bisa bersekolah dengan normal?

---

ยูอีจิน เด็กหนุ่มผู้รอดตายจากอุบัติเหตุเครื่องบินตกและใช้ชีวิตเป็นทหารมานับแต่นั้นได้กลับมาหาครอบครัวของเขาในที่สุดหลังจากผ่านเวลาไปเป็นสิบปี

description.zh:
超强少年佣兵归来！
欺负我妹的一个都不准跑！

幼年遭遇飞机失事，成为唯一幸存者的柳亦真，为了生存成为了佣兵。十年后，因偶然的契机得以回到故乡上学并找回了自己的家人。正当他为失而复得的家人感到幸福，为安逸的生活感到欣喜时，却发现事情并不如他所愿。

---

Yu Ijin foi o único sobrevivente de uma queda de avião quando ainda era criança. Depois de se tornar um mercenário por 10 anos para sobreviver, ele retornou para sua família em sua cidade natal.

altTitles.ja: どぶがわ

description.en: A look into the lives of the various residents in one quiet community.

altTitles.ja: ピンクとハバネロ

description.en: Two weeks have passed since the start of high school. Miyao Mugi encounters the handsome, cool Kurose Kei coldly rejecting a confession. That very same day, Mugi meets him again, but in the most unexpected place and even acting completely differently?! What will happen now that she knows Kei's secret?
description.vi:
“Tôi cũng muốn có bạn trai!”

Mugi, một cô nữ sinh trung học với chỉ số kinh nghiệm yêu đương là số không và không có năng lực giao tiếp với đám con trai, tình cờ va vấp phải Kurose một hot boy trung học, tuy vô cùng đẹp trai nhưng lại cực kỳ không thân thiện với các cô gái.

Thật là thô lỗ và khó chịu mà, nhưng… hình như mình vừa vô tình biết được công việc bán thời gian bí mật của Kurose !? (っ ಠ‿ಠ) っ

description.en: Losing memories after a confession?! A crossdressing boy and the one he loves are cursed to never fall deep in love, and are forced to repeat their confession over and over. What is the antidote to love? Can there be miracles in true love?

Children who are beginning their youth.  
Their growing pain on their way to spring.

title.en: Saikyou Yuusha Party wa Ai ga Shiritai

altTitles.ja: 最強勇者パーティーは愛が知りたい

altTitles.en: Hero's Party Want to Experience LOVE

altTitles.ja-ro: Saikyō Yūsha Pātī wa Ai ga Shiritai

description.en:
The strong and popular hero won't let me (the unpopular mage) go for some reason!!!
The adventures of the strongest hero's party is full of strange love.

title.en: Danshi Kokoseidakedo Gyaru ni TS Shimashita

altTitles.ja: 男子高校生だけどギャルにTSしました

altTitles.en: I’m a High School Boy, but I Got Gender-Swapped Into a Gyaru

altTitles.ja-ro: Danshi Koukousei Dakedo Gal ni TS Shimashita

description.en:
Shunpei, a loner high schooler, became a gyaru after saving the god of gyaru from drowning. Through his mother's connections, he was able to transfer to an all-girls school, but it was stuffed to the brim with gyarus! 
Every day is a sensory overload for Shunpei, who's never even talked to a girl, let alone a gyaru.

It's the beginning of an introverted high school guy => gender-swapped gyaru comedy!

---
- [Alternative Official Raw (NicoNico)](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/67976)
description.ja:
陰キャ男子・桜井は、目の前で溺れていたギャル神様を助けた恩恵でギャルになってしまった。
母親の伝手で転校することができたが、その学校はギャルだらけの女子校だった！
ギャルどころか女子とまともに交流したことがない桜井にとって刺激が強すぎる毎日…。
陰キャ男子高校生⇒ギャルTSコメディ開幕！！

altTitles.zh-ro: Si Ling Fashi! Wo Ji Shi Tianzai
Sǐ Líng Fǎshī! Wǒ Jí Shì Tiānzāi

description.en: The game has emerged into reality, the rules of the world have been turned upside down and humanity has entered the era of becoming players with the world set as a game stage. The only way to become a player is by leveling up to become stronger! The only way to rise to the top of the world! On the day of world fusion Lin Moyue chose to take on the sole hidden class, Necromancer. From then on, Lin Moyue would not die until his summoned creatures died out. “I sit on the throne of bones as the God of the dead and walk between life and death.” “I am a walking catastrophe!”
description.zh: 游戏降临现实，世界规则颠覆，人类进入全民转职时代。 唯有成为转职者！升级变强！方能站上世界之巅！ 转职当天，林默语成为唯一性隐藏职业，死灵法师。 从此召唤物不死绝，林默语便不会死。 “我高坐骸骨神座，行走生死之间。” “我即是天灾！”

title.en: Mobile Suit Gundam SEED Astray R

altTitles.ja: 機動戦士ガンダムSEED ASTRAY R

altTitles.ja-ro: Kidou Senshi Gundam SEED: Astray R

description.en: Junk dealer Lowe Guele travels the universe with the Gundam Astray Red Frame he finds in the destroyed colony of Heliopolis!

title.en: Yamada-kun to Lv999 no Koi wo Suru

altTitles.ja: 山田くんとLv999の恋をする

altTitles.en: My Love Story with Yamada-kun at Lv999

altTitles.pt-br: Minha História de Amor com Yamada-kun Nível 999

description.en:
Recently dumped, Akane is just about to quit the game she used to play with her boyfriend when she meets Yamada in the same RPG. Yamada in real life turns out to be somewhat of a legend. The only problem is - he is ONLY interested in the game. As Akane's feelings grow, will Yamada's focus stay on the game?

The manga won the Tsutaya Comic Award in 2022.
description.ja: 彼氏をネットゲームで知り合った他の女に取られた茜。ストレス発散に雑魚モンスターを狩っていると、ギルドメンバーのアフロ男・山田に声をかけられる。同じギルメンの誼でフラれたことを愚痴るも、山田は無表情で「興味ない」とそっけない返事。挙句に「狩場を譲れ」と言う山田に「これだからゲームする男なんて！」とキレる茜だったが、好きなゲームをフラれっぱなしでやめられないと一念発起。ネトゲのリアルイベントが開催されることを知った茜は元彼に会えるかも……とお洒落をして会場に乗り込むが、元彼の横には新しい彼女の姿が……。直後、人混みに押され転んでしまった茜に手を差し伸べたのは超イケメンの黒髪男子。しかしそんなイケメンの無愛想な態度と「興味ない」という言葉で頭に浮かんだのはあのアフロ頭のアバター……この眼の前にいるイケメンこそあの山田だった!?　目の前で元カレのイチャコラを見せつけられた茜は山田を居酒屋に連行してヤケ酒に付き合わせる。酔いつぶれた茜が目を覚ますと、そこは見知らぬ場所……山田の部屋だった。もしかして私……!?
description.pt-br: Akane Kinoshita pegou seu namorado tendo um caso com uma garota de um jogo online e ficou completamente arrasada. Ela tenta desestressar matando uns bichos no jogo, e acaba desabafando sobre seu caso com Yamada, um jogador de sua guilda — mas ele responde com um "tô nem aí" curto e grosso. Entretanto, quando Akane decide invadir um encontro offline do jogo para se vingar de seu ex-namorado, ela ouve essas palavras marcantes ao vivo, e seu coração bate mais forte ao conhecer Yamada ao vivo...

description.en: Doujinshi Chinese from the Asgard saga from the anime Saint Seiya.

altTitles.ja: クロッシング25;

description.en: A battle takes place during the 25th hour of each day. There are only a chosen few that can fight. Two sides: those that fight to preserve yesterday and those that fight to ensure that tomorrow comes. Which side will win?
description.ru: В каждых сутках после 24 часов есть дополнительный 25 час. И этот час всегда наступает в одном и том же месте и он есть только для избранных, они сражаются между собой. Одни защищают вчеращний день, другие отстаивают следующий день. Кто же победит в этой нелегкой борьбе?

title.en: Touhou Ibara Kasen ~ Wild and Horned Hermit.

altTitles.en: Eastern Thorned Poet Hermit ~ Wild and Horned Hermit.

altTitles.ru: Тохо Ибаракасэн ~ Дикий и Рогатый Отшельник

altTitles.ja: 東方茨歌仙　～ Wild and Horned Hermit.

altTitles.de: Der Rosenpoet des Ostens ~ Wild and Horned Hermit.

altTitles.uk: Тохо Ібаракасен ~ Дика та Рогата Відлюдниця

description.en:
In this 10 volume official Touhou series, spanning the time period of nine long years between the UFO and WBaWC games, we follow the misadventures of the business inept shrine maiden Reimu Hakurei and her ever-curious friend Marisa Kirisame, who meet a mysterious, young hermit woman named Ibara Kasen.  
  
Upon seeing how sloppily the Hakurei Shrine conducts its business, she decides to become a regular shrine visitor, determined to lend her near unlimited wisdom to the shrine maiden, in order to make her place a proper Shinto Shrine. Does the nagging, yet well meaning hermit bring nothing but good-will with her advice, or is there something more sinister hiding behind the friendly face and her bandaged arm?
description.pt:
De Zun, Wild and Horned Hermit é o último mangá da série Touhou, seguindo os passos de Silent Sinner in Blue, Inaba the Moon & Inaba the Earth e a triologia Sangetsusei.  
Desta vez, Marisa encontra uma misteriosa eremita fora da aldeia humana, No entanto, ela contou para Reimu sobre essa mulher, sendo vista ao redor do Santuário, ela é Ibara Kasen, uma estranha asceta com um braço enfaixado por causa de uma certa habilidade desconhecida da natureza, cujo mantem uma disciplina mais consciente do que elas e de qualquer um em Gensokyo.

altTitles.ja: 天地ミッション

description.en: Earth, an agent of a secret intelligence agency, is so quiet that no one even notices him. Unlike himself, Uranus, a busty dark-skinned masochist masked girl who has become a hall-of-famer agent, suddenly appoints him as her partner and invites him to "save the world together?!"
description.ja: 地味すぎて誰にも気づかれない秘密情報局エージェント・アース。同期ではあるものの自分とは違い殿堂入りエージェントとなった褐色巨乳のドＭマスク・ウラヌスから突如相棒に任命され「一緒に世界を救おう」と誘われ!?

title.en: The Angel Next Door Spoils Me Rotten: After the Rain

altTitles.ja: お隣の天使様にいつの間にか駄目人間にされていた件 after the rain

altTitles.ja-ro: Otonari no Tenshi-sama ni Itsu no Ma ni ka Dame Ningen ni Sareteita Ken: After the Rain

altTitles.pt-br: Meu Anjo de Vizinha Me Mima Demais: After the Rain

description.en: A spin-off of the series *[The Angel Next Door Spoils Me Rotten](https://mangadex.org/title/2fec6641-beb1-4ae9-a32f-204dd06688ac/the-angel-next-door-spoils-me-rotten)* which comicalizes the stories from Volume 5.5 of the Light Novel and its special edition booklet, which contains additional short stories.

altTitles.ja: クソ女に幸あれ

altTitles.ja-ro: Kuso Onna ni Sachiare

description.en:
"I've been cheating on you. Oh, and it's not just one guy. It's three. Sorry about that."

Back in middle school, Akiyoshi Sunao's first-ever girlfriend shattered his heart, and he swore off love. However, all that changes when he develops a crush on a girl in his university's film club. Just as he's finally beginning to move on from the past, he bumps into his ex-girlfriend. Little does he know that this is only the beginning...

To his horror, he wakes up in her body the next morning!
description.es-la: "Te he estado engañando. Ah, y no es sólo un chico. Son tres. Lo siento". En la secundaria, la primera novia de Akiyoshi Sunao le destrozó el corazón y renunció al amor. Sin embargo, todo eso cambia cuando se enamora de una chica en el club de cine de su universidad. Justo cuando finalmente comienza a dejar atrás el pasado, se topa con su exnovia. Lo que no sabe es que esto es sólo el comienzo... ¡Para su horror, se despierta en su cuerpo a la mañana siguiente!
description.pt-br: "Eu tenho te traído. Ah, e não é apenas um cara. São três. Desculpe por isso." De volta ao ensino médio, o primeiro amor de Akiyoshi Sunao despedaçou seu coração, e ele jurou evitar o amor. No entanto, tudo muda quando ele se apaixona por uma garota no clube de cinema da universidade. Justo quando ele está começando a superar o passado, ele esbarra com sua ex-namorada. Mal sabe ele que isso é apenas o começo... Para seu horror, ele acorda no corpo dela na manhã seguinte!

altTitles.ja: ひまりのまわり

description.en: Aizawa Haruki, 16 years old, is in his 2nd year of high school, and likes to live efficiently. One day during summer vacation, a girl, Aizawa Himari, suddenly appears, calling him 'Onii-chan' and claiming that she's his little sister. As it turns out, Haruki's father recently remarried, and his new wife brought a daughter with her. However, since both of their parents are overseas, it'll only be the two of them living under the same roof. And for some reason, Himari seems very obstinate about spending as much time with Haruki as she can.

Yul, the manager of the interdimensional dump truck office, accidentally kills an innocent man named Kwon Yoo-jun. In order to make amends, Yul enters a romance fantasy novel where Yoo-jun is the villainess and tries to send her back to her original world. However, due to various complications, Yul becomes trapped in the novel. With the office staff scattered and no knowledge of the novel's plot, Yul desperately searches for a way out. But, Yoo-jun, who is now pretending to be a noble lady in the new world, causes Yul a headache.
Marcus has a crush, and Cog is completely unprepared for the hijinks that follow. Hopefully in their efforts to grow closer, they can brighten each other's day.
description.pt-br: Marcus tem uma queda por Cog e Cog está completamente despreparado para as travessuras que se seguem. Esperançosamente, em seus esforços para se aproximarem, eles podem iluminar o dia um do outro.

altTitles.ja: 愛囚ラヴァ

description.en: In a world where people suddenly developed super-powers, those who used their abilities to do evil are held at Catastrophe Prison. Shu Ono, a guard at the prison, somehow fell in love with the strongest female prisoner Lava! A crazy love-comedy about the forbidden relationship between guard and prisoner!
description.es-la: Un mundo en el que las personas desarrollan repentinamente habilidades diferentes. Los que utilizan sus habilidades para hacer el mal son encarcelados en una prisión de catastrófica. Shu Ono, que trabaja allí como guardia, se enamora de algún modo de la prisionera más fuerte, ¡Lava!

altTitles.ja-ro: エム

description.en:
Eiji Matsuda has his heart set on a University student he met through his job... Well, more accurately, he has his heart set on her *body.*

After six months of him waiting, she finally accepts being his girlfriend, under one condition: there's no sex allowed. Will Eiji be able to keep his cool around all of her provocations?!

altTitles.ja: 冗談だろ…
地味な女主任がメガネ外したら超美人だった話

altTitles.ja-ro: Joudandaro...
Jimina jo Shunin ga Megane Hazushitara chou Bijin Datta Hanashi

description.en:
**Notes:**
- This series was originally started in [2022](https://twitter.com/k_sanjo/status/1517703053922680833). However, the official raw links to a higher quality release that came out later.

title.en: Sex Kakumei Okoshimasen ka? ~Nazo no dokushin Kizoku ni Kareshi Sengen saremashita~

altTitles.zh: 来掀起一场性爱革命吧～被谜之单贵族宣示主权～

altTitles.zh-hk: 來掀起一場性愛革命吧

altTitles.ja: セックス革命起こしませんか? ~謎の独身貴族に彼氏宣言されました~
GIGANTIS―ジャイガンティス―

description.en:
On that day, humanity was turned into “prey”―Gen is a high school student living on the island of Tsushima, a door to mainland Japan.

Along with his sickly sister, Misaki, and his heartwarming mother, Gen was living a peaceful life, all until an “asymmetrical monster” appears on the island. All hell breaks loose on the island of Tsushima.

These monsters devour everything from plants to animals, to humans, and mutate together. Will humanity stand a chance against these mutant creatures? Is there any hope?
description.uk:
Того дня людство було перетворено на «здобич».
Ґен — старшокласник, який живе на острові Цушіма, що є дверима до материкової Японії.
Разом зі своєю хворобливою сестрою Місакі та чарівною матір'ю Ґен жив мирним життям, поки на острові не з'явився «асиметричний монстр».

Після цього на острові Цушіма починається пекло.

Ці монстри пожирають все, від рослин до тварин і людей. Після цього мутують.
Чи матиме людство шанс протистояти цим істотам-мутантам?
Є якась надія?

altTitles.ja: 僕のダイヤモンド・スター

description.en:
Takuma is an ordinary first-year high school boy from the countryside who happens to be a (male) idol otaku. He spends all his free time working part-time in hopes of one day seeing his favorite idol live in concert. However, one day, his favorite idol Kei suddenly suspends all public appearances due to "health problems." Takuma is devastated by the news, until one day when Kei himself moves into the house next door…

“I want to help. If there’s anything I can do, please let me know.”

“There’s nothing you can do.”
